definitions.title: vb.denom.
definitions.body: act or treat as foreign, or strange; disguise, misconstrue;—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִנׇּכֵר]] Pr 26:24 with his lips a hater disguiseth himself (dissembles, speaks what is foreign to his thought).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִכַּר]] 1Sa 23:7, but v. infr.; Impf. [[וַיְנַכְּרוּ]] Je 19:4 and they have treated this place as foreign (profane); [[יְנַכְּרוּ]] [[חָרֵהוּ]] De 32:27 lest their adversaries should misconstrue (it).—[[בְּיׇדִי]] ´[[נִכַּר אׂתוֹ א]] 1Sa 23:7 God hath alienated him into my hand, but improbable; LXX [[מָכַר]] (cf. Ju Jdg 4:9) hath sold him, so Th Klo HPS (cf. We); < [[סִכַּר]] (as Is 19:4) Krochm Dr; Kit either of these; > [[סִגַּר]] Bu; Löhr either [[סִגַּר]] or [[סִכַּר]].

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּתְנַכֵּר אֲלֵיהֶם]] Ge 42:7 he acted as a stranger toward them; Pt. f. [[מִתְנַכֵּרָָה]] 1Ki 14:5, 1Ki 14:6 feign to be a stranger-woman.
